programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: An outdoor-loving family of four leaves Tacoma to find a home on quirky Vashon Island in Washington's Puget Sound.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: First time homebuyers Meg and Spencer want a Chicago home with vintage charm.

programme.title: House Hunters International
programme.desc: A couple wants a house with a view in Villefranche-sur-Mer on the French Riviera.

programme.title: House Hunters International
programme.desc: From Denmark to the Dominican Republic, we follow home seekers around the world as they navigate the sometimes rough waters of buying real estate in other countries.

programme.title: Louisiana Flip N Move
programme.desc: Three teams of Louisiana entrepreneurs go head-to-head as they battle to find one family's dream home. The team won't just be sourcing, buying and flipping the house -- they have to move it too!

programme.title: First Time Flippers
programme.desc: Armed with varying skill levels, we watch as novice flippers attempt to turn a disaster house into a high dollar flip. Do they have what it takes to cash in on the real estate market?

programme.title: Rehab Addict
programme.desc: Nicole rehabs the upper unit's kitchen and bathroom, saving an original medicine cabinet.

programme.title: Rehab Addict: Detroit

programme.desc: Constantin and Christina have a supersized basement family room, but no ideas on how to use the space. Anitra and the Mega Dens team will give the couple their own personal entertainment zone.

programme.desc: Did you know that every household is susceptible to hail damage? We're swinging a real Huey helicopter through the neighbourhood, dumping golf balls onto our roof just to show you the simple fix.

programme.title: TANZANITE Gems
programme.desc: Tanzanite is a rare gem with a captivating purple-blue hue - mesmerizing when teamed with sparkling Diamonds & gleaming Rose or Yellow Gold. Come be delighted by this highly attractive gemstone.

programme.title: Kenyan Tsavorite
programme.desc: King of Garnets?, Kenyan Tsavorite is a brilliant green gemstone increasingly popular due to its beautiful greens, a truly scarce and valuable gemstones in the world.

programme.title: Umbalite Gems
programme.desc: Umbalite is a stunningly beautiful, extremely rare gemstone available in three distinctly beautiful hues imperial (orange-pink similar to Imperial Topaz), purplish-pink and purple.

programme.desc: An ancient stone giving you a passage way into timeless elegance. It boasts colour intensity and gives you a sense of opulence unmatched by any other gem.

programme.desc: Ethiopian opal is one of most valuable and appreciated of all opal varieties. In 2008, Australia proclaimed black opal to be the official state gemstone for New South Wales.
